main event: A bright light object of unknown color, described as a yellow light, was observed moving away to the north slowly over Bradley Beach, New Jersey for 3-4 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as one bright light of unknown color, with a yellow light.
The object was observed moving away to the north slowly.
The sighting was reported by a civilian source.
The case was concluded as possibly a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: one bright light object of unknown color, yellow in appearance
